body.name: 5 Tier Ladder Shelf with 2 Hooks, Modern Metal Wood Bookcase Shelf, Wall Mounted Bookshelf, Standing Display Storage Organizer for Home, Office, Kitchen, Living Room, Bedroom
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: 【Space Saving Ladder Shelf】This 5-tiered bookshelf adds more vertical storage space, allowing you to use it to place books, photo albums, crafts, potted plants, etc. The standing shelf is perfect for displaying your decorations and storing other items.

【Wall Mounted Display Shelf】This bookcase needs to be placed against the wall. After fixing the nails, the wall shelf has strong stability. The hooks can hang items such as bags, headphones, clothes, etc. This space saving shelf is very friendly to narrow spaces.

【Combining Metal and Wood】The bookcase shelf is made of premium particleboard and a high-quality rust-resistant coating metal frame, which is durable. With excellent metal frames and a thick solid particleboard, the bookshelf can hold up to 110 LBS.

【Modern Industrial Style Design】The storage shelf combines modern particleboard with industrial metal, making your space clean, tidy, and practical. This is a multifunctional and stylish metal shelf that is perfect for a bedroom, kitchen, living room, office, or anywhere else.

【Easy to Assemble & Customer Service】The bookshelf's overall dimension is 10.6"D x 16.5"W x 67.7"H. The shelf organizer can be installed quickly with the product installation manual. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Practical Storage Solution!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 5 Tier Ladder Shelf with 2 Hooks for my home office, and it has been a game-changer! The modern design seamlessly blends with my decor, and the sturdy metal-wood construction not only looks attractive but also provides reliable durability.This shelf offers ample space for organizing books, office supplies, and decorative items, contributing to a clutter-free and stylish workspace. The wall-mounted feature adds stability and efficiently saves floor space, making it a perfect fit for any room.The two hooks are a fantastic addition, allowing me to conveniently hang small items within easy reach. What truly stands out is the shelf's exceptional build quality, ensuring it can effortlessly handle a substantial amount of weight without any concerns.Assembling this bookshelf was a breeze, thanks to its user-friendly design. It has seamlessly integrated into my home, combining functionality with fashion. I highly recommend this shelf to anyone seeking a chic and practical storage solution – it has certainly exceeded my expectations, and I'm confident it will do the same for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars space-saving, stylish, and overall awesome
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I really love my ladder shelf with hooks! It's like a super cool space-saving in my room. This shelf is not just any shelf; it's my storage BFF. Let me tell you all about it!It is a tall and awesome shelf that stands against the wall. I can put all my favorite things on it – books, photos, crafts, and even my beloved potted plants. It's like my personal display of awesomeness!And guess what? It has these hooks that hang out on the side. I use them for my bags, headphones, and sometimes even my favorite clothes. It's like having a shelf and a hanging buddy all in one. No wasted space here!Now, the shelf is a combo of metal and wood. The shelves are made of super strong particleboard, and the frame is this cool rust-resistant metal. It's like having the Avengers protecting my stuff – strong and durable!The design is straight out of an industrial style magazine. It's modern, it's chic, and it makes my room look clean and tidy. It fits in my bedroom, kitchen, living room – basically anywhere I want to show off my style!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ample Storage Space
reviews.reviewText: This modern metal and wood bookcase shelf not only provides ample storage but also adds a touch of contemporary elegance to any room. The sleek and modern design of this ladder shelf immediately caught my eye. The ladder-style structure adds a dynamic touch to the room, making it more than just a storage solution. The 5-tier design of the shelf offers ample storage space for displaying books, decor items, plants, and more. The varying heights of the shelves create an interesting visual dynamic, allowing for creative arrangements to showcase various items. It strikes the perfect balance between form and function. A great solution for limited spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enhance Your Home with This Chic and Practical Ladder Shelf!
reviews.reviewText: The 5 Tier Ladder Shelf with 2 Hooks has been a remarkable addition to my home office. Its modern design fits perfectly with my decor, and the sturdy metal-wood construction is both attractive and reliable. It provides ample space for storing books, office supplies, and decorative items, keeping my workspace organized and stylish.What I admire most is the wall-mounted feature, which adds stability and saves floor space. The two hooks are a handy feature for hanging small items, keeping them within easy reach. The shelf's overall build quality is excellent, ensuring it can hold a good amount of weight without any issues.Assembling this bookshelf was a breeze, and it has been a functional yet fashionable addition to my home. It’s a perfect choice for anyone looking for a stylish and practical storage solution. I am confident that it will exceed your expectations just as it has mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wall rack/ladder shelf
reviews.reviewText: It’s just okay. Could be better, stronger, and sturdier. The frame is made of super thin metal while the shelves are made of decent faux wood. I imagine if you can attach it to studs it might be more sturdy but simply securing it to drywall would be a no no. It’s a cute shelf and would look nice installed. I have no desire to insert more holes into my wall so I will attempt to attach it with adhesives and see how it does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A bad batch?
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this product twice and both times the lower metal piece did not come with a cap hole to screw the feet on. It's just hollow throughout. Although it was relatively easy to assemble the shelf and it seems sturdy enough if I were to place it on the wall, I don't want to scratch up my wood floor. Now I have 2 of these shelves with no way of attaching the feet rendering both useless to me. Who fell asleep at the factory?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic and Functional Ladder Shelf Adds Character
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the lookout for a stylish yet functional bookcase for my home office, and this 5-tier ladder shelf with hooks turned out to be a perfect match. The modern metal-wood combination adds a contemporary and chic look to my space, blending seamlessly with my existing decor. Each shelf offers ample space, allowing me to organize my books, decorative items, and office supplies neatly.The wall-mounted design is sturdy and saves floor space, which is ideal for my compact office.Assembly was straightforward, and all the necessary hardware was included. The shelf feels stable and secure once mounted, giving me confidence in its safety and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, spacious and looks great!
reviews.reviewText: I worried there wouldn’t be enough room on each shelf but I was wrong. I am able to fit books and decor on each shelf. I love that it takes up such little space and looks perfect with any decor. I originally planned to put it in my room but it looks so great, I decided to put it in my foyer. It’s not only space saving, it is actually like wall decor itself.
